summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 regarding the transfer of financial documents related to the Epstein investigation. An Assistant U.S. Attorney coordinates with an FBI forensic accountant and a contractor to copy subpoena returns from American Express and Deutsche Bank onto discs for law enforcement.

persons.name: Hamilton
persons.context: Addressed in an email to burn specified folders containing subpoena returns onto discs for the Epstein investigation.

connections.description: M instructs Hamilton to burn financial documents to discs for the investigation.

events.title: Coordination for financial document transfer
events.description: Email chain discusses plans to copy subpoena returns from American Express and Deutsche Bank onto discs for the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: Financial documents from American Express and Deutsche Bank were subpoenaed as part of the 2018 SDNY investigation into Epstein (case USvEpstein-2018R01618).
An FBI forensic accountant was being brought onboard to assist in the investigation as of July 2019.
The email chain shows active coordination between an Assistant U.S. Attorney, an FBI squad, and a contractor to secure financial records.
